channel.title: Pokemon Sprites
channel.description:
Firstly let me say i take no credit for these whatsoever, i did not find them, make them or edit them. I took them from P:DOA who probably took from Pokemon LG or D so ultimately credits to Nintendo. I have uploaded these mainly for Jorsa but anyone is free to use and abuse. they include:
[ul][li]Pokemon(all shiny,non-shiny and icons[/li] [li]Berries[/li] [li]Trainers[/li] [li] And some other stuff[/li][/ul]
[URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2WX624H1]Download Here[/URL]

item.title: Pokemon Sprites

Actually Jorsa requested me to post this and it wouldn’t belong anywhere else
